scripts.smoke:beta:run: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep=smoke --config-file cypress.beta.config.js
scripts.smoke:stage:run: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep=smoke --config-file cypress.stage.config.js
scripts.smoke:local:run: percy exec -- cypress run CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:9090 --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep=smoke --config-file cypress.stage.config.js
scripts.smoke:stage: DEBUG=cypress:cli:run,cypress:server:cypress,cypress:launcher,cypress:server:plugins,cypress:server:run,cypress:server:video,cypress:network:connect percy exec -- cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --record --key ##CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY_API## --env grep=smoke --config-file cypress.stage.config.js --reporter /opt/node_modules/@videoamp-private/cypress-testrail-reporter --reporter-options domain=videoamp.testrail.io,username=##TESTRAIL_API_USERNAME##,password=##TESTRAIL_API_PASSWORD##,projectId=1,suiteId=1,runName='Smoke Test - ##RELEASE_NAME## - ##BRANCH_NAME##',buildUrl=##BUILD_URL##,githubUrl=##GITHUB_COMMIT_URL##
scripts.smoke:beta: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --record --key ##CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY_API## --env grep=smoke --config-file cypress.beta.config.js --reporter /opt/node_modules/@videoamp-private/cypress-testrail-reporter --reporter-options domain=videoamp.testrail.io,username=##TESTRAIL_API_USERNAME##,password=##TESTRAIL_API_PASSWORD##,projectId=1,suiteId=1,runName='Smoke Test - ##RELEASE_NAME## - ##BRANCH_NAME##',buildUrl=##BUILD_URL##,githubUrl=##GITHUB_COMMIT_URL##
scripts.regression:beta: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --record --key ##CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY_API## --env grep=regression --config-file cypress.beta.config.js --reporter /opt/node_modules/@videoamp-private/cypress-testrail-reporter --reporter-options domain=videoamp.testrail.io,username=##TESTRAIL_API_USERNAME##,password=##TESTRAIL_API_PASSWORD##,projectId=1,suiteId=1,runName='Regression Test - ##RELEASE_NAME## - ##BRANCH_NAME##',buildUrl=##BUILD_URL##,githubUrl=##GITHUB_COMMIT_URL##
scripts.regression:stage: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --record --key ##CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY_API## --env grep=regression --config-file cypress.stage.config.js --reporter /opt/node_modules/@videoamp-private/cypress-testrail-reporter --reporter-options domain=videoamp.testrail.io,username=##TESTRAIL_API_USERNAME##,password=##TESTRAIL_API_PASSWORD##,projectId=1,suiteId=1,runName='Regression Test - ##RELEASE_NAME## - ##BRANCH_NAME##',buildUrl=##BUILD_URL##,githubUrl=##GITHUB_COMMIT_URL##
scripts.regression:beta:run: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep='regression; smoke' --config-file cypress.beta.config.js
scripts.regression:local:run: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:9090 cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep=regression --config-file cypress.stage.config.js
scripts.regression:stage:run: cypress run --project src/ --headless --browser chrome --env grep='regression; smoke' --config-file cypress.stage.config.js
